model.weapon

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.weapon.Effect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Action> actions
      the list of all actions
      private boolean afterBaseLinked 
      private java.util.List<java.util.List<Player>> alreadyInteractedPlayers
      used in linked to next actions
      private int alreadyTarget 
      private boolean canBeUsed
      used to see if the effect can be used in a specific moment
      private Effect chainedTo
      if and only if the chained effect has been executed
      private int chainedToAction
      this attribute indicates the number of the actions with which the effect is chained to 0 if it is chained to all the effect (see "Grenade Launcher" rules)
      private Ammo cost 
      java.util.List<Player> effectTargettable
      the list of possible players that can be hit in the effect in a specific moment
      private boolean executed 
      private boolean isLinked
      true if he effect is linked to an action
      private java.lang.String name 
      private boolean newTarget
      true if targets can be only different target from the already hit ones (except for the additional damage)
      private int nOfOptionalTargets 
      private boolean onlyMovement
      true if this effect contains only MovementActions
      private boolean throughWalls 
      private Visibility visibility
      this attribute indicates the visibility while shooting in this particular effect

      • Effect

        public Effect()

      • Effect

        public Effect(java.lang.String name,
              boolean executed,
              java.util.List<Action> actions,
              boolean newTarget,
              int nOfOptionalTargets,
              int alreadyTarget,
              Effect chainedTo,
              Visibility visibility,
              Ammo cost,
              int chainedToAction,
              boolean onlyMovement,
              boolean throughWalls,
              boolean afterBaseLinked)
        the effect is constructed and filled in the parsing process
        Parameters:
        name - name of the effect
        executed - true if the effect has been executed
        actions - list of all Actions in the effect
        newTarget - number of players to be targeted
        nOfOptionalTargets - number of Optional Targets; it's up to the client to decide if he wants to target them or not
        alreadyTarget - number of Targets to be targeted that has been already hit in a previous effect

        public boolean isValid(GameManager gameManager,
                       Player player)
        method to check if it's possible ,using this Effect, to do a valid shooting action with the current Weapon it checks if the player has the right ammos to pay for the cost and if it has at least one valid target to hit

        player - the player that he's trying to shoot

      • payCost

        public void payCost(GameManager gameManager,
                    Player currentPlayer)
        method called at the beginning of the effect to pay the corresponding cost. If player has valid powerUps to discard for the cost then he makes the player choose among one of them

      • startAction

        public void startAction(DamageAction damageAction,
                        GameManager gameManager,
                        Player currentPlayer)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed It takes the valid target that can be hit from the visibility methods. After that, it requests to the client the correct targets:tiles, rooms, directions or players.
        Parameters:
        damageAction - the type of new Action
        gameManager - the current Game
        currentPlayer - the current Player

      • startAction

        public void startAction(MovementAction movementAction,
                        GameManager gameManager,
                        Player currentPlayer)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. It checks all the parameters that are needed to take the right choice about what the player has to do next: if he needs to choose a target to move or he needs to move himself
        Parameters:
        movementAction - the current action
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -

      • startAction

        public void startAction(MarkAction markAction,
                        GameManager gameManager,
                        Player currentPlayer)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed It's similar to the startAction about the damageAction.
        Parameters:
        markAction -
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -

        public Direction isAValidDirection(GameManager gameManager,
                                   Direction direction)
                            throws GameException
        method to check if the chosen direction is valid
        Parameters:
        gameManager -
        direction - the cosen direction
        Returns:
        the corresponding direction in the possible Choices
        Throws:
        GameException - it's thrown if the choice is not correct

      • afterChooseDirectionAction

        public void afterChooseDirectionAction(DamageAction damageAction,
                                       GameManager gameManager,
                                       Direction direction,
                                       Player player)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid direction It checks again what types of targets need to be chosen: players or tiles

      • afterChooseDirectionAction

        public void afterChooseDirectionAction(MarkAction markAction,
                                       GameManager gameManager,
                                       Direction direction,
                                       Player player)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid direction It checks again what types of targets need to be chosen: players or tiles

      • afterChooseDirectionAction

        public void afterChooseDirectionAction(MovementAction movementAction,
                                       GameManager gameManager,
                                       Direction direction,
                                       Player currentPlayer)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid direction It checks again what types of targets need to be chosen: players or tiles; it also check if the currentplayer needs to be moved or an enemy needs to. It differentiate also among the different types of possible movements

      • isAValidTarget

        public Player isAValidTarget(GameManager gameManager,
                             PlayerView p)
                      throws GameException
        checks if the chosen playerView is a valid target
        Parameters:
        gameManager -
        p - the playerView chosen
        Returns:
        the corresponding player in possibleChoices
        Throws:
        GameException - if the player chosen is not valid

      • afterChooseTargetAction

        public void afterChooseTargetAction(DamageAction damageAction,
                                    GameManager gameManager,
                                    Player currentPlayer,
                                    Player targetPlayer)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid target it checks if the target player has a valid powerUp to counter attack; if not, it checks if the currentPlayer has valid after damage powerUps. If not it terminates the action computation
        Parameters:
        damageAction - the current action
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer - the player that's shooting
        targetPlayer - the player chosen

        handles the damage to deal to a specific target
        Parameters:
        gameManager -
        damageAction -
        targetPlayer - the player to hit

      • afterChooseTargetAction

        public void afterChooseTargetAction(MarkAction markAction,
                                    GameManager gameManager,
                                    Player currentPlayer,
                                    Player targetPlayer)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid target. It gives the corresponding marks to him
        Parameters:
        markAction - the current Action
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -
        targetPlayer - the target chosen

      • afterChooseTargetAction

        public void afterChooseTargetAction(MovementAction movementAction,
                                    GameManager gameManager,
                                    Player currentPlayer,
                                    Player targetPlayer)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid target. It checks all the possible cases checking all the flag to provide the right movement that need to be done according to the Weapon
        Parameters:
        movementAction - the current action
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -
        targetPlayer - the target chosen

        public Tile isAValidTile(GameManager gameManager,
                         TileView t)
                  throws GameException
        checks if the selected TileView is valid
        Parameters:
        gameManager -
        t - the TileView chosen
        Returns:

        Throws:
        GameException - if the selected TileView is not valid

      • afterChooseTileAction

        public void afterChooseTileAction(DamageAction damageAction,
                                  GameManager gameManager,
                                  Player currentPlayer,
                                  Tile targetTile)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid tile. It delas damage to all the players in the tile (except for the current player). It also check for possible counterattacks and after damage powerups.
        Parameters:
        damageAction - the current action
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -
        targetTile - the tile selected

      • afterChooseTileAction

        public void afterChooseTileAction(MarkAction markAction,
                                  GameManager gameManager,
                                  Player currentPlayer,
                                  Tile targetTile)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid tiles. It gives the corresponding marks to all the players in the tile (except for the current player)
        Parameters:
        markAction - the current action
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -
        targetTile - the tile selected

      • afterChooseTileAction

        public void afterChooseTileAction(MovementAction movementAction,
                                  GameManager gameManager,
                                  Player currentPlayer,
                                  Tile t1)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid tile. It checks all the flag the provide the right movement (of an enemy or of the current player)
        Parameters:
        movementAction - the current Action
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -
        t1 - the Tile selected by the player

                              RoomColor roomColor)
                       throws GameException
        checks if the selected room is valid
        Parameters:

        roomColor - the room selected

        Throws:

      • afterChooseRoomAction

        public void afterChooseRoomAction(DamageAction damageAction,
                                  GameManager gameManager,
                                  Player currentPlayer,
                                  RoomColor roomColor)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid rooms. it deals damage to all the players in that room. checks if there are players that can use powerUp for counter attack or if the current player can use an after damage powerUp
        Parameters:
        damageAction -
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -
        roomColor - the room selected

      • afterChooseRoomAction

        public void afterChooseRoomAction(MarkAction markAction,
                                  GameManager gameManager,
                                  Player currentPlayer,
                                  RoomColor roomColor)
        method called after the visit. Here it's known the type of the currentAction it's going to be executed. this method is called after the user has chosen a valid room. Gives marks to all the player in the room
        Parameters:
        markAction - the current action
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer -
        roomColor - the room selected

      • afterExecution

        public void afterExecution(Action action,
                           GameManager gameManager,
                           Player player)
        method to deal with the end of the current Action. It checks if there's a possible Linked Effect, if the effect has ended or if there are action linked. In case the effect is finished it calls a method of the current Weapon to check if there are other possible effects
        Parameters:
        action - the current Action
        gameManager -
        player - the current Player

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        checks if two effects are the same
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj -
        Returns:
        true if they are the same, false otherwise
